summary: During the Vietnam War, a South Korean base receives a radio transmission from a missing squad, presumed dead, and sends a platoon to rescue the lost squad from the R-Point.
cast: Woo-seong Kam|Byung-ho Son|Sun-kyun Lee|Park Won-Sang|Tae-kyung Oh|Jin-ho Song|Yeong-dong Mun|Kyeong-ho Jeong|Byeong-cheol Kim|Ju-bong Gi|Nae-sang Ahn|David Anselmo|James Han|Dong-kyu Lee
title: Arpointeu
